column4: hi. i wantet to test the herd 6 release (please don't say anything, i know that it is alpha) and didn't want to install a new system but wanted to upgrade my existing ("no matter if it breaks..."). apt-get now says: "Internal Error, Could not perform immediate configuration (2) on python-minimal". any ideas on how to fix this?
you might want to ask in #ubuntu+1 which is the correct channel for feisty
np - it isn't as well known as it should be :)
